thread.title: Business visit for Pharmaceutical machinery
thread.title_full: Business visit for Pharmaceutical machinery - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Fakrul Hassan F
title: Business visit for Pharmaceutical machinery
text: This is Center place almost manhattan and from here to my exhibition Javic Convention center communication is perfect, a lot of restaurant surrounding here, the hotel people is excellent especially the person who help me for check in , he is so nice well behaviour man, I should mention his name also, he is Mr Mohammad, who give all information as per my question nicely and correctly, I like to come this hotel again and again, As per recommendation this is best in manhattan
